p: Vero E6 ( Cercopithecus aethiops derived epithelial kidney) cells were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) supplemented with 2.5% heat-inactivated fetal calf serum (FCS), 2 mM l-glutamine, 100 units/mL penicillin, 100 μg/mL streptomycin, 1 mM sodium pyruvate, and non-essential amino acids (Sigma #M7145, St. Louis, MI, USA). For experiments in the presence of breast milk, the medium was supplemented with 100 µg/mL gentamicin. Cells were grown at 37 °C in a 5% CO 2 humidified incubator.
